model

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Customer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Customer>

    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Customer>
    The basic class for modelling a customer. Contains information about the customer's id, name, phonenumber, address and bankaccount. Its equipped with a constructor for defining the fields and basic getter methods related to the different fields. Also, this has a special toString() method to easily show in GUI's.
    Author:
    tbrj

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Customer c)
